title: Ricky Ponting
summary: Ricky Thomas Ponting, AO, is an Australian cricket commentator and former cricketer, and two-time World Cup winning captain in 2003 and 2007, widely regarded as one of the greatest batsmen of all time. Ponting was captain of the Australian national team during its 'golden era'; between 2004 and 2011 in Tests and 2002 and 2011 in One Day Internationals.
